backend

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.Config

  • public class Config
extends java.lang.Object
    Global configuration class that allows easy access to the user settings stored in config.pems.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Jacob Jones, Andrew Rottier

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String addressLineOne 
      private java.lang.String addressLineTwo 
      private java.lang.String departmentName 
      private boolean persistence 
      private java.lang.String phoneNumber 
      private boolean setupStatus 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Config()
      Calls the method that parses through and stores the settings values from config.pems.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAddressLineOne()
      Returns a String value containing the first line of the address of the police department utilizing PEMS.
      java.lang.String getAddressLineTwo()
      Returns a String value containing the second line of the address of the police department utilizing PEMS.
      java.lang.String getDepartmentName()
      Returns a String value containing the name of the police department utilizing PEMS.
      boolean getPersistence()
      Returns a boolean value indicating whether the program should exit normally or run in the background at all times.
      java.lang.String getPhoneNumber()
      Returns a String value containing the phone number of the police department utilizing PEMS.
      boolean getSetupStatus()
      Returns a boolean value indicating whether or not the program has been set up.
      private void parseConfigFile()
      Populates the instance fields of this class by reading and parsing config.pems.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getSetupStatus

        public boolean getSetupStatus()
        Returns a boolean value indicating whether or not the program has been set up.
        Returns:
        true if the program has already been set up; false if otherwise

      • getPersistence

        public boolean getPersistence()
        Returns a boolean value indicating whether the program should exit normally or run in the background at all times.
        Returns:
        true if the program should persist on close; false if otherwise
